thread.title: Beckham Family Skiing and Snowboarding Vacation in Canada
thread.title_full: Beckham Family Skiing and Snowboarding Vacation in Canada

author: Kayleigh Roberts
title: Beckham Family Skiing and Snowboarding Vacation in Canada
text:
The Beckhams are proving that they do family vacations better than most families, which just continues their lifelong trend of being the best at things. The whole fam is on vacation together at the Whistler slopes in Canada, People reports. In a pre-Instagram world, we might have been left to merely imagine their marvelous skiing and snowboarding vacation‚Äîbut this is not a pre-Instagram world, so we can see the enviable trip with our own eyes.
 Honestly, the whole trip looks like it belongs in a catalogue.
Boys on the top ‚õ∑üèÇüèÇ
